programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.

programme.title: Dinotrux

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: When Odlulu uses the Fairytale Key to pull Hans Christian Andersen’s fairytale characters from an old storybook and into present day Copenhagen, the Wanderers must rely on their knowledge of these timeless stories to put these characters back where they belong.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Mrs Goggins is spearheading a recycling initiative “A Greener Greendale” but has been overwhelmed by donations of plastic bottles and compost. Meanwhile, Pat picks up today's special delivery - blocks of ice to make an igloo at the school for their North Pole project. Pat and Ajay struggle to get the slippery blocks into PAT2, then Pat and Jess must endure a journey with the air-con on full blast to keep the blocks frozen. Despite this, the ice starts to melt on the way to the Schoolhouse. PC Selby is getting concerned by the overflowing recycling and deems it a traffic hazard. Ted and Alf help collect the recycling early but some of the plastic bottles spill onto the road, causing a road jam that blocks Pat. By the time he gets the blocks to the schoolhouse there is nothing left but tiny ice cubes. The children are disappointed but Pat remembers thinking the plastic bottles in the road earlier were ice. He and Ted unload the recycling and Lauren and the children use the plastic bottles to make a much warmer igloo instead. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Something strange is going on in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Every time Raa Raa visits a friend there is a loud roar… and it wasn't him! Who could it be? Raa Raa sets off to find out

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Cloppycorn is in charge of the Swapsy Game. Everyone puts a toy into the Swapsy Wagon and takes a toy out! It's brilliant fun – until the fairies yo yo. disappears from the wagon altogether. Cloppycorn's very upset. No one will trust him to pull the wagon again! Noddy tells him not to worry. He's going to investigate and help Cloppycorn find the missing toys. With the help of Bumpy and Revs, Noddy uses his investigative skills to work out that the two fairies had taken out the yo yo themselves because they were worried Cloppycorn wouldn't look after it. They apologies to Cloppycorn and the swapsy game starts again. And this time, everyone plays together! Well done Noddy. Case closed!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Slugsy has put too much slime on his slide and is terrified of sliding off it. Can the other tots help him overcome his fear?

As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Pixie’s pet crab goes into a cave, Kelp uses his knowledge of crabs under the sea to coax him out using dance and rhythm. / Scallop’s special shell is broken, but Kelp transforms the broken bits into something even more special.

Her family launches into an epic retelling of how Tag got her tag. / Spike is about to launch into space when he calls Tag in a panic to tell her that he left his special blankie behind! He can’t sleep without it! Tag, Grandmaw, and Grandpaw race off to the rocket launch to try and get it back to him.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go

programme.title: The Closet

programme.title: Before I Wake

programme.title: Air Warriors S11
programme.desc: This documentary series shows five generations of jet engines. These fighter jets are capable of carrying bombs and soar close to the edge of space. The sixth generation of fighter jets began in 2020, and the 11th season has covered most of the air artillery since then.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Spring is late this year, and when it finally arrives, the race is on to find a mate and start a family; black bears and beavers in the west, wood frogs in the south and 20,000 gannets in the east all have one thing on their minds.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Summer is the season of plenty for most animals, but not polar bears; unable to hunt seals until the sea freezes over again, they grow hungrier by the day; for other animals summer is when youngsters must learn how to survive.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Feeling a little bored with their new hero life, Po and the kids are excited to accept an important invitation to the Forbidden City. Meanwhile, there's a curious disturbance deep in Panda Village...

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Mel Shellman gets fired and crashes with the FAST crew, but he's so annoying they try to get him rehired; An old flame shows up, making Chet jealous.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: Dozer and Skya work together to find their way home after they are attacked by Shockarachnids, jumper-cable-like snakes with high-voltage bites

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: When Odlulu uses the Fairytale Key to pull Hans Christian Andersen’s fairytale characters from an old storybook and into present day Copenhagen, the Wanderers must rely on their knowledge of these timeless stories to put these characters back where they belong.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Mrs Goggins is spearheading a recycling initiative “A Greener Greendale” but has been overwhelmed by donations of plastic bottles and compost. Meanwhile, Pat picks up today's special delivery - blocks of ice to make an igloo at the school for their North Pole project. Pat and Ajay struggle to get the slippery blocks into PAT2, then Pat and Jess must endure a journey with the air-con on full blast to keep the blocks frozen. Despite this, the ice starts to melt on the way to the Schoolhouse. PC Selby is getting concerned by the overflowing recycling and deems it a traffic hazard. Ted and Alf help collect the recycling early but some of the plastic bottles spill onto the road, causing a road jam that blocks Pat. By the time he gets the blocks to the schoolhouse there is nothing left but tiny ice cubes. The children are disappointed but Pat remembers thinking the plastic bottles in the road earlier were ice. He and Ted unload the recycling and Lauren and the children use the plastic bottles to make a much warmer igloo instead. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Something strange is going on in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Every time Raa Raa visits a friend there is a loud roar… and it wasn't him! Who could it be? Raa Raa sets off to find out

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Cloppycorn is in charge of the Swapsy Game. Everyone puts a toy into the Swapsy Wagon and takes a toy out! It's brilliant fun – until the fairies yo yo. disappears from the wagon altogether. Cloppycorn's very upset. No one will trust him to pull the wagon again! Noddy tells him not to worry. He's going to investigate and help Cloppycorn find the missing toys. With the help of Bumpy and Revs, Noddy uses his investigative skills to work out that the two fairies had taken out the yo yo themselves because they were worried Cloppycorn wouldn't look after it. They apologies to Cloppycorn and the swapsy game starts again. And this time, everyone plays together! Well done Noddy. Case closed!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Slugsy has put too much slime on his slide and is terrified of sliding off it. Can the other tots help him overcome his fear?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop pet-sit Crabby, who acts out until they realize he’s missing home. / Kelp feels like he can’t choose between a celebration on land or under the sea. So he attempts to do both... at the same time!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: There’s a new “babblist” in town- someone who claims to understand baby talk. Boss Baby spots this fraud right away;and must debunk his tactics before he scams the playgroup parents. Meanwhile;Tim tries to sell magazines with Boss Baby’s help.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Three adolescent thunderdrums are wrecking havoc on Berk and only Thornado can control them.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When Poppy worries that her father doesn’t feel useful now that’s he’s no longer King, she asks her friends to bring Peppy small problems to solve. But will Peppy be able to face a real threat, in the form of a swamp monster?/When Cloud Guy moves into Branch’s bunker, Branch will do whatever it takes to get his unwanted roommate to leave- including inviting his annoying cloud parents over.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. They play and become friends. / The unicorns are eager to play with a new mystery item that washes up on the beach, but what is it? While the other unicorns come up with imaginative ideas of what it could be, Pixie is determined to find out exactly what it is.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Pixie’s pet crab goes into a cave, Kelp uses his knowledge of crabs under the sea to coax him out using dance and rhythm. / Scallop’s special shell is broken, but Kelp transforms the broken bits into something even more special.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag and Scooch play Scooch’s favorite board game outside, using the whole town of Pawston as the board. \Tag thinks it’s time for an update to the Pawston City Anthem, which inspires a city-wide music competition where competitors will create and perform new Pawston anthems.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag is left in charge of the Pawston Pawtomotive for the day, Frank and Beans open up a rival garage and take all the business. But when all the cars around Pawston break down because of Frank's shoddy mechanic work, Tag and Scooch have to go around town to fix all his mistakes. \ Scooch wants to be a Tail-kwondo master like his hero, Master Wag, but he can't break a biscuit with his tail. Tag helps train him (and his tail), and they even track down Master Wag who gives Scooch a good luck charm. But when Scooch loses the good luck charm before his tail-kwondo test, he needs to find a way to believe in himself.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: It’s Show and Tell Day for the Race Cadets! Tag decides to talk about how she got the race flag tag on her collar, but realizes she doesn’t know the real story of how she got it. He can’t sleep without it! Tag, Grandmaw, and Grandpaw race off to the rocket launch to try and get it back to him.

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.desc: A life story of three friends, one who is rich, one who is poor, and one who wishes to be rich, along with their families.

programme.title: Queen's House
programme.desc: A revenge story about a woman in the top 1% starting over from the ground up to reclaim her stolen life and find her true ‘home'. A passionate drama of people striving to regain the true meaning of life.

programme.title: Snow White's Revenge
programme.desc: A mystery romance with a woman who wanted to have the world and a woman who risked everything for revenge.

programme.title: ROUND PLAYLIST

programme.title: Moving Voices Mini Album

programme.title: Villains Everywhere
programme.desc: A comedy drama about wild and sometimes heart-warming daily lives of the Korean housewife sisters and their family.

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: CSI S3 E18 - Precious Metal
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.title: Ang Utol Kong Hoodlum (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Behind his bad boy image, Ben (Robin Padilla) has a big heart. The modern day Robinhood collects grease money from jeepney drivers in behalf of the syndicate. He then gets a meager amount in return which he uses to feed his adoptive parents whom he loves dearly.

programme.title: Extranghero
programme.desc: After causing a series of troubles in his hometown, Botong (Andrew E) leaves for Manila to look for his long-lost mother. But he ends up in a mental asylum where he meets the beautiful Kristy.

programme.title: Apoy Sa Puso
programme.desc: This is a love story as torrid and as passionate as a smouldering volcano.

programme.title: Nagalit Ang Buwan Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: A story of married couples but leaves their own spouses for their relationship.

programme.title: Hanggang Dito na Lang
programme.desc: Hilda Koronel discovered that love, fidelity and being a perfect wife and mother were not enough to keep a husband from straying.

programme.title: Ang Pinakamagandang Hayop sa Balat ng Lupa 1
programme.desc: Gloria Diaz plays a strange but a beautiful woman who is washed ashore in an island where her presence causes intrigue, jealousy, strife and later on, even a series of deaths.

programme.title: Walang Matigas Na Pulis Sa Matinik Na Misis
programme.desc: Admired for his good looks and his popularity with the ladies, most people would call Bart (Bong Revilla Jr). But if there's one thing that grounds Bart, that's his fear of his wife.

programme.title: Akin Ang Pangarap Mo
programme.desc: Leo is engaged to Anita out of convenience since her father and her parents are long time friends. It was never an issue, until Leo meets Gigi during his stay in the family farm.

programme.title: Andrea, Paano Ba Ang Maging Isang Ina?
programme.desc: Two teachers find themselves on opposite sides in the fight for freedom. Nora Aunor is the woman who chose to join the rebels while her friend, Gina Alajar opted for a quiet life with her husband.

programme.title: Subukan Kami Kung Kaya Nyo
programme.desc: Subukan Kami Kung Kaya Nyo

programme.title: Ultimatum
programme.desc: Dina played a Filipina working with a US-based chemical company. Eddie played the Chief of Police assigned to protect the chemical company visiting group which fell victim to a terrorist gang. Eddie was only too obsessed to save the company because Dina happened to be his girlfriend.

programme.title: Pitong Gamol
programme.desc: They are uneducated but smart. They are orphans but the whole neighborhood is their family. Life treats them harshly but they survive.

programme.title: Alex Boncayao Brigade
programme.desc: New People's Army comrade Ka Romy (Ronnie Ricketts) is assigned by higher command to form an elite hit team to operate in the city. Their group is called the Alex Boncayao Brigade. Meanwhile, the military also mounts an operation to capture the brigade. When will both sides realize that in war, there can be no winners and losers.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: Live from London, we catch you up with overnight markets news from the US and Asia. Plus, we'll tell you what matters for investors in Europe, giving you insight before trading begins.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Europe
programme.desc: Anchored by Anna Edwards and Mark Cudmore, a fast-paced show of news and analysis, building towards the drama and excitement of the start of trading across the Continent.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Open

programme.title: Four Corners - Hammered: Inside the Bunnings Machine
programme.desc: Bunnings has become one of Australia's most dominant and profitable retailers. Critics say it's a corporate predator systematically picking off independents, shutting down competition and abusing its dominance with suppliers.

programme.title: Media Watch - Episode 14

programme.title: Creative Types With Virginia Trioli - Jenny Kee

Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

programme.title: Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. As they dive deeper, the property's dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: Endless Love
programme.desc: A young girl encounters a novelist in a bar and quickly falls in love with him. However, it turns out she has fallen into a trap set up by the novelist and his ex-girlfriend who is a ghost with a disfigured face. The journey of revenge and ultimate terror has just begun!

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: The Hungry Ghost Festival is around the corner. A newcomer at a workplace offends the ghosts in his office building when he shows disrespect for the spirits on his first day at work. In the course of a night shift, the man and his colleagues working overtime experience spooky encounters that make them reflect on their behaviours and beliefs...

programme.title: Chain Mail
programme.desc: A chain mail is forwarded to a group of people - some pass it on while others ignore it. After one of them suddenly dies, a series of mysterious deaths follows. Sandra learns that the chain mail is cursed and decides to find the origin and mystery behind to stop the misfortune. Will she break the curse before it's too late?

programme.title: No. 82 Haunted House
programme.desc: The eldest son of the Mu family dies suddenly on the eve of his wedding. To rest his soul, a maid Xiao Die is made to marry and then buried alive with him. Since then, Mu's house is haunted by a series of terrifying incidents, and the family's secrets are gradually unveiled when Mu’s youngest daughter return home from abroad with her boyfriend.

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Lexy's life becomes a living nightmare after surviving a huge white shark attack in which her father and sister died. However, with the help of a psychiatrist, she delves deeper into the haunting flashbacks and gradually uncovers the truth of what happened that fateful night.

programme.title: Hollow
programme.desc: Beth, an old woman with early signs of Alzheimer’s disease, moves in to a new house with her daughter’s family. Despite her loss of reality and worsening symptoms, Beth uncovers something sinister observing her every move. A dark and horrific confrontation is about to begin…

programme.title: Painted Face
programme.desc: Scholar Wang Huai Qing sells paintings to save his ailing wife. He is attacked by a bird demon along the way but is rescued by Fox demon Xiao Rong. To elude the pursuit, Wang brings Xiao Rong home, sparking a love triangle and at the same time, unfolding an impending love between human and demon.

programme.desc: Beth, an old woman with early signs of Alzheimer’s disease, moves in to a new house with her daughter’s family. Despite her loss of reality and worsening symptoms, Beth uncovers something sinister observing her every move. A dark and horrific confrontation is about to begin…

programme.title: Painted Face
programme.desc: Scholar Wang Huai Qing sells paintings to save his ailing wife. He is attacked by a bird demon along the way but is rescued by Fox demon Xiao Rong. To elude the pursuit, Wang brings Xiao Rong home, sparking a love triangle and at the same time, unfolding an impending love between human and demon.

programme.title: Chain Mail
programme.desc: A chain mail is forwarded to a group of people - some pass it on while others ignore it. After one of them suddenly dies, a series of mysterious deaths follows. Sandra learns that the chain mail is cursed and decides to find the origin and mystery behind to stop the misfortune. Will she break the curse before it's too late?

programme.title: No. 82 Haunted House
programme.desc: The eldest son of the Mu family dies suddenly on the eve of his wedding. To rest his soul, a maid Xiao Die is made to marry and then buried alive with him. Since then, Mu's house is haunted by a series of terrifying incidents, and the family's secrets are gradually unveiled when Mu’s youngest daughter return home from abroad with her boyfriend.

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Lexy's life becomes a living nightmare after surviving a huge white shark attack in which her father and sister died. However, with the help of a psychiatrist, she delves deeper into the haunting flashbacks and gradually uncovers the truth of what happened that fateful night.

programme.title: Drug Runner Lover
programme.desc: After investigating a drug smuggler for years, police finally receive information that leads to his arrest but he refuses to talk. Police have just 8 hours to identify, locate and arrest the entire ring.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: When a house fire turns out to be a triple murder involving a 7-year-old girl, Tulsa Homicide takes it personally.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: Detectives gather crucial information about a double-homicide from neighbourhood surveillance footage, but they're not able to identify and track the killer until some key digital data is uncovered.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S1)
programme.desc: When railroad mechanic Robert Limon is shot and killed by Jonathan Hearn, an investigation leads to Robert's widow — and spurs questions about her involvement in the crime.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S1)
programme.desc: When a parolee is bounced from his job, he seeks retribution on a peaceful, unwitting community when he kidnaps, tortures and kills a mother and caregiver.

programme.title: Women On Death Row
programme.desc: In 2009, Emilia Carr and her boyfriend Joshua Fulgham were convicted for the first-degree murder and kidnapping of Heather Strong, and Emilia alone was sentenced to death.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S2)
programme.desc: After police respond to an apparent suicide, the case takes an unexpected turn when investigators cannot find a gun near the body.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: A relentless detective leaves no stone unturned until the entire truth behind a young woman's brutal death is exposed and everyone responsible for taking her life is brought to justice.

programme.title: Partis Rouler
programme.desc: Antoine and Alexis ride along a legendary route: the Sea to Sky Highway. In Squamish, they meet Christian Bégin who takes them on a high-altitude adventure.

programme.title: Chroniques D'En Haut
programme.desc: A magazine programme devoted to the mountains. An opportunity to explore a rich and fascinating world and take a sumptuous journey through the heart of the most beautiful landscapes of the Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes region.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Api !
programme.desc: Api and Koro return to the sports field to try to understand what happened to Éric. They reconstruct the events and gather clues.

programme.title: Les Quatre Saisons De Léon
programme.desc: In the kingdom of Escampette, Boniface the storyteller is in love with Queen Héloïse. Just as he's asked for her hand in marriage, Princess Mélie arrives with her friends. Against the Queen's advice, they naively decide to pitch their tent on the lakeshore, at the foot of the Sacred Mountain...

programme.title: À Travers Champs
programme.desc: The way we treat and feed animals is increasingly being taken into account in buying decisions. Many producers are consequently doing everything possible to provide the best living conditions to their livestock.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Point
programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Les Pires
programme.desc: A film crew sets up in a disadvantaged suburb of Boulogne-sur-Mer. At the end of the casting, the inhabitants are stunned: the four teenagers selected to play the leading roles are considered to be the bad lot in the suburb. Lily, Maylis, Jessy and Ryan, the happy chosen ones, cannot believe it themselves.

programme.title: Un Week-End
programme.desc: For 10 year-old Hector, the coming weekend is certain to be a very special one. He's about to meet his father, someone he hardly knows, and spend two days and two nights with him.

programme.title: C'Était Pas Du Bourgogne
programme.desc: Between two phone calls, a grandfather recounts his memories from when he was 20 and from the war.

programme.title: Un Soupçon
programme.desc: Delboscq is shocked when she finds out that five of Isabelle's former partners are dead or in a coma. There has never been the slightest proof implicating her: these cases have been closed. Faced with this dead end, the investigator decides to inform the press to try to get things moving.

programme.title: Un Soupçon
programme.desc: The noose is tightening around Isabelle, who thinks that she has covered her tracks. Her son, Antoine, is found poisoned and accuses her in turn. Charged and referred to the criminal court despite the lack of proof, Isabelle has a high chance of being acquitted. Delboscq risks everything to have her convicted.

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: The sculptures created by Agnès Baillon, almost always women, capture our gaze for an exchange steeped in humanity. From Parisian workshop to art gallery, scenes from everyday life displayed free of artifice but rich in nuance.

programme.title: Meurtres Au Mont-Saint-Michel
programme.desc: After visiting the exorcist priest in Mont-Saint-Michel, a building site supervisor is found with a hole in his skull identical to that of Bishop Aubert, who founded the abbey in 709! Police Captain Sophie Maliquot takes over the case with its mix of exorcism, revenge and family revelations...

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: Encounter with Julien des Monstiers both in his studio at the Château de Chambord and at a magisterial solo exhibition. Dragons and other extraordinary creatures populate a world beyond contemporary conventions.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Le Journal De L'Économie
programme.desc: Three minutes to analyse, understand and explain the latest economic news.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Le Point
programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Juste Une Mise Au Point
programme.desc: Director, scenarist, actress, Baya Kasmi looks back at a film career that set out to describe contemporary society with humour and derision. She directed ''Le Nom des Gens'', ''Je Suis à vous Tout de Suite'', ''Yousef Salem a du Succès''...

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil

programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: C Dans L'Air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: C'Est Du Belge
programme.desc: Gerald Watelet shines the spotlight on the people putting Belgium on the map. Expect reports on the best culture and heritage ambassadors, behind-the-scenes glimpses of elite events and profiles of those making headlines.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Le Jardin Extraordinaire
programme.desc: Surrounded by scientific advisers and commentators, Tanguy Dumortier covers the natural world and the environment through reports and unpublished documents.

programme.title: Au Pays Du Bonheur
programme.desc: Accompanied by Philippe Tzou, a Francophile from Taipei, Marc-André discovers the feeling of freedom that reigns in the city. He tries to understand how, in this modern metropolis, as vibrantly alive at night as it is during the day, the Taiwanese cultivate their spiritual well-being.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: Nos Terres Gourmandes
programme.desc: We head off on a praline-flavoured tour to Roanne to meet the famous Pralus and Mons families and discover their know-how.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Le Jardin Extraordinaire
programme.desc: Surrounded by scientific advisers and commentators, Tanguy Dumortier covers the natural world and the environment through reports and unpublished documents.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Hector finally joins his dream soccer team as their good luck charm, but what happens when his luck runs out? // While preparing bao for the Chinese Cultural Fair, Sid and Adelaide face off against time-hopping bandits!

programme.title: The Really Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln has a crush on Lynn's new best friend, Zia, and the only thing stopping him from asking her out is... Lynn. In a series of trials and tribulations, Lincoln tries to prove to Lynn that he's worthy of dating Zia.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max bets Phoebe she can't turn off being a superhero and go on a normal date. Chloe helps Phoebe do well on the date, but Max tries to sabotage it by crying wolf. Suddenly, a real supervillain emerges and puts Max and Chloe in serious danger.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Danger Force is hired by Rivalton's Duke Wellington to protect him and his ponytail from his jealous uncle, Archduke Fernando. They at first think it's easy money, until they find out The Archduke hired Ray and Henry Hart to capture Duke Wellington.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When Ray hears that Piper is going to Junior Anger Management to work on her anger issues, he makes a wager with Henry that he can make her lose her temper before the night ends.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: After Schwoz creates a disease that accidentally effects Charlotte, Henry, his family, and even Ray, he quarantines them in Henry’s house in order to find a cure.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Hit by the realization that her big sister will be going off to college soon, Leni tries to thwart Lori's plans. // Lincoln and Clyde start their own cookie-making business, but realize it's a lot more work than they realized.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lynn's extreme sports superstitions cause chaos at a professional hockey match. // Unable to part with their childhood toys, the kids try to convince Mom and Dad that they still play with them.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lori regrets everything she hasn't done in high school, and vows to make up for lost time in her senior year. // When Lola realizes that double the cuteness could help her break into show business, she teams up with Lily.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The mutant seahorse called MUSTANG SALLY is going to flood the city... and the only thing standing in his way are LEO and Pigeon Pete. Being the leader isn't all it's cracked up to be.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob will do anything to get to meet his newest hero, Kenny The Cat. // Attempting to get more work out of Squidward, Mr. Krabs spins the story of the monstrous Yeti Crab, which eats lazy workers.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: In order to save money, Mr. Krabs fires SpongeBob. Unable to just “do nothing”, SpongeBob decides to go back to work doing anything, anywhere.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob tries to take a shortcut to work, but becomes lost along the way. // After failing his driver’s test again, Mr. Krabs decides to teach SpongeBob how to drive himself.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: After receiving an invitation to a gallery opening, Squidward scrambles to find a friend to take with him. // While trying to order a special sandwich, Patrick gets swept up in the fast paced world of business.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick hires other Patricks to entertain at parties. // Pat-Thos shares a Hamdonian tale of love and pork products.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Squidina helps Patrick get back on-model. // The Star family takes over the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Draculaura & Toralei are magically stuck together on Ghoul Spirit Day while Clawdeen & Frankie track down a Codex. // On Scareer Day, Heath and his dad Hades must work together to save the school from a swarm of vicious pixies.

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: As Gil trains for the Deep Waters Challenge, he realizes that Lagoona is actually the right monster for the job. // Skelita learns to honor her Abuela her own way after accidentally ruining her gown for a fashion competition.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and her pals enlist Carlos X as their coach in a skate-off against Tony Hawk! // Tired of the bullies at school, Alexis learns the tough guy ropes from Carl.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Bobby's dream of playing in a band might finally come true, but can he hang with Par's punk pals? // Worried he's not keeping up with his cool friends, Sameer tries to break a record for some street cred.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: The Casagrandes celebrate Paco's wedding, but they need to find las arras that Sergio lost!

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Charlie gives Dylan the courage he needs to stand up for himself amidst peer pressure. Myles and Yasmine get fit and healthy with Rebecca's unwanted assistance.

programme.title: Hunter Street
